item.title: AI-Powered Web Vulnerability Scanner
item.description: AI-driven vulnerability scanner that automates penetration testing by generating fuzzing commands and using NLP to analyze terminal outputs.

item.title: Programming for Cyber Security
item.description: Developed four Python scripts for brute-force simulation, data scraping, IP extraction, and DNS port confirmation for cybersecurity analysis.
